summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Burke Avenue from No. 40th Street to No. 45th Street et al in the City of Seattle, by laying watermains under Ordinance No. 18661, creating Local Improvement District No. 1762 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
